content:
**from the description ** > as this little shawlette was taking > shape i couldn t help but notice a > resemblance to a slice of citrus due > to its semi-circular shape and > increases subtly radiating from the > center with its bit of ruffle and > ruching and especially its reference > to my favorite of the california > winter crops i knew i would be > wearing this wintry fruit accessory to > each and every holiday party this > year
*if you re looking for a nice knitterly gift citron kits are now available click here 1 each comes with a pattern a skein of malabrigo lace and a handmade citron-flavored project bag * **to discuss citron share photos or search the frequently asked questions visit the yarniad s symposium 2 group ** **finished measurements** length of straight edge 34 inches height at center 14 inches note measurements taken after blocking
